room.roomBeingRecordedMessage: Please be aware that this audio room is being recorded. By participating, you consent to your voice and any shared content being used for broadcast or distribution in public spaces. If you prefer to not have your voice recorded or shared, you are welcome to listen in without participating verbally. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation

createChannel.title: Create new channel
createChannel.detailsDescription: Build your audience and engage with members. Create a Channel to get one step closer to monetizing your content and brand.
createChannel.adminStepDescription: Your admins can make changes to the channel, delete a channel, start and end a room, and maybe do a couple more things that we need to add here in this paragraph.
createChannel.leadersStepDescription: Your admins can make changes to the channel, delete a channel, start and end a room, and maybe do a couple more things that we need to add here in this paragraph.

settings.manageSecurity: Manage your account’s security and connections.
settings.earnOnChatter: See how you can earn revenue on Chatter and adjust your options.
settings.subscriptionSettings: Adjust your subscription settings and features.
settings.controlInformation: Control the information you view and share on Chatter.
settings.viewAccDetails: View your account details, including your phone number and email address.
settings.deactivatingInfo: More information on temporarily disabling and deactivating your account.
settings.letThePeople: Let people who have your phone number find you on Chatter.
settings.letChatterUse: Let Chatter use your phone number to personalize our services, including marketing and SMS messages. If you do not enable this, Chatter may still use your phone number for purposes including account security, fraud, and abuse prevention.
settings.seeOurPrivacy: See our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
settings.ifYouWantChangeUsername: If you want to change your @username, you don’t need to deactivate your account. Edit in
settings.editPrefereces: Edit your preferences for interests and topics
settings.manageTheAccounts: Manage the accounts and channels you’ve muted or blocked
settings.controlWhoCanFind: Control who can find you and manage contacts
settings.manageTheTypeOfContent: Manage the type of content you are interested in
settings.peopleYouFollow: People you follow can always message you.
settings.letOthersPeopleByEmail: Let others find you by your email
settings.letOthersPeopleByPhone: Let others find you by your phone
settings.removeAnyContacts: Remove any contacts you’ve uploaded and turn off syncing address book contacts. Note: This takes time to complete.
settings.getNotifiedInAMoment: Get notified when you are mentioned or tagged in a moment
settings.getNotifiedWhenMentonied: Get notified when you are mentioned or replied to for comments
settings.relatedToChannels: Related to channels you are an admin in
settings.notifyNewScheduledRoom: Notify you when a channel you are apart of has a new scheduled room
settings.changesSubscriptions: Get notified when changes to your subscription take place
settings.notVerified: You are currently not verified. Get verified and receive your checkmark by completing the verification process below.
